data.name: Business+ Account
data.description: Everday banking for your business. Manage business cashflow and expenses.

fees.name: ATM
fees.additionaInfo: You may be charged an upfront fee for withdrawals and balance enquiries when using some ATMs. This fee will be determined by the third party ATM owner. The fee will be disclosed and charged by the ATM owner at the time of performing the transaction.

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionaInfo: A one-off fee payable for the establishment of your overdraft facility, as set out in the relevant Business Overdraft Letter of Offer. This fee will be incurred by you on the Loan Date and reduce the funds available to be drawn under your Overdraft Limit on the Loan Date.

fees.name: Facility Fee
fees.additionaInfo: A monthly fee, payable on the last Business Day of the month (this fee is payable even if you have not used your overdraft facility) as set out in the relevant Business Overdraft Letter of Offer.

features.additionalInfo: An overdraft facility is available (subject to approval).
You can access your accounts on your mobile for all your online banking.
Unlimited transfers between your savings and transaction accounts.

features.additionalValue: All statements, notices and other communication in connection with these terms and conditions and your account may be given electronically by Great Southern Bank by: email, text message, in app push notifications, in app prompts, or letting you know by email, text message or push notification that the information is available on the app or on a website. You should check your emails, text messages and push notifications regularly.
Link your transaction account to Mastercard® debit card.

features.additionalInfo: Make transfers and send payments in real time.
Use this account to make and received PayID payments.
The product includes fraud protection functionality.
Subject to terms and conditions, you may need to nominate a guarantor during the origination process for an overdraft.

constraints.additionalInfo: Maximum cumulative amount of transactions is $20,000 per day.
Maximum number of transactions per day is 50.
You can only hold a maximum of 10 accounts for this product.
You can only hold a maximum of 99 cards for this product.
Single cash ATM/POS withdrawal limit of $2,010.
There is a maximum limit of 50 card transactions in a 24 hour period.
Daily domestic single card transaction limit of $20,000.
Cumulative non-cash daily transaction limit of $20,000.
Transaction limit per card transaction of $20,000.
International single card transaction limit of $20,000.

eligibility.additionalValue: You must be an Australian tax resident.

eligibility.additionalInfo: To open an account, you must have an active ABN or ACN, and you must be registered as either a Sole Trader or a Private Company with the Australian Business Register.

In order to apply an overdraft on this product, you will be subject to additional criteria including but not limited to: your business must be registered for GST; and your business must be wholly or predominantly available for business purposes operating in Australia.
You must have an Australian mobile number and a valid email address.
To open an account, you will need to download, register and activate your Great Southern Bank Business app.
To open an account, you must meet our ID verification requirements.
To open an account, you must have an Australian Address.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Only applicable to Authorised Overdraft. Customer margin may apply

lendingRates.additionalValue: Only applicable to Unarranged Credit Limit. Applied every month to the portion of the overdraft which exceeds their Approved Credit Limit.

depositRates.additionalInfo: There is no credit interest on this product.
